name: progressbar widget
description:
Pimp your plugins with the latest in widget technology ! This plugin implements a simple progressbar for the statusline. Never again you will have to wonder, how you should tell your user that something is happening.

This may be the foundation of big vim widgets library :O)
install_details:
- extract it to your vimdir
- read the example in autoload/vim/widgets/progressbar_example.vim
